attribs.name: repeating_action_-Kqnf-9TYOAh2UY3-2Wb_content
attribs.current:
attacks while victim is asleep (Advantage), drains an additional 1d2 per minute until its drained 4 hp.
This damage is to MAX HP.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KqneVImn3B6g1Z0ZVi8_content
attribs.current: If left in contact with precious metals (typically coins) the hungry goldbug will each 1 gold per minute in value up to 600 gp a day. Once it has eaten 60 gold in value, it lays an egg which will hatch into a hungry goldbug in 24 hours. It usually begins eating 1 hour after it has been placed in a pile of treasure. No one is sure where the mass goes, as it eats tons of gold with seemingly no end.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-Kqned0QPzjN-4Q147e5_content
attribs.current: When immobile Goldbugs look like normal coins.
